originalText.text: This is a great video game store. They got everything from new to retro games and consoles. And if your into animation they got u covered. Friendly service and good prices

text.text: This is a great video game store. They got everything from new to retro games and consoles. And if your into animation they got u covered. Friendly service and good prices

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Astro Games for years now, and I can honestly say that it’s the best video game store in Washington Heights. The staff is incredibly knowledgeable and friendly, and they always go out of their way to make sure I find what I’m looking for. The store itself is clean and well-organized, and they have a fantastic selection of games for all platforms. I’ve never had a bad experience at Astro Games.

text.text: I’ve been going to Astro Games for years now, and I can honestly say that it’s the best video game store in Washington Heights. originalText.text:
Even though I've been in NYC all my life, I didn't start coming to this store until earlier this year. Because I don't live in the area, I never knew about it. No one ever spoke about it to me. It was the other mom and pop places in Manhattan everyone talked about.

I found their website and noticed they usually receive games even EARLIER than these others stores. That impressed me but I was also impressed with the communication on the website. The owner is always updating his customers. What time the game will arrive. What day. What week. Very transparent and I appreciate that and I'm sure all of us do.

Every interaction I've had with the owner or other coworkers have been great. No complaints whatsoever. If you're someone who enjoys getting games early (possibly even a day(s) earlier than the other well known stores who get games early), give this one a try.

originalText.text: Highly recommend video game store . amazing /great customer service . great Personal and owner. always give the customers great advice and recommendations on games on all consoles . I love the store and all the anime figures and all the type of card games. great for pre orders as well very accurate on upcoming games. I also had an issue with my console and they fixed it. Awesome Store 100 % Recommended to anyone .

originalText.text:
Not a good customer service.
Went to the store with my friend and he is special the owner was staying at him like he was going to steal something from his store.
I asked the owner that I wanted see NES game.
He said that he does not show games until you don't  buy the game.
I said I will buy it. Then he take it out and then I want to see it he does not want me to touch game. It was only $10
I collect NES games and want to make sure the stickers are good from the top and front of game.
I and not going back to this store again. And recommend nobody to go there, because the customer service is very bad.
